code: var fade_in_out=function fade_in_out(){var contentEles=document.getElementsByClassName("fade-in");console.log(contentEles);var appearOptions={threshold:1,rootMargin:"-15% 0px 0px 0px"};var appearOnScroll=new IntersectionObserver(function(entries){entries.forEach(function(entry){if(entry.isIntersecting){entry.target.classList.add("appear");}else{entry.target.classList.remove("appear");}});},appearOptions);Array.from(contentEles).forEach(function(ele){appearOnScroll.observe(ele);});};export default fade_in_out;
